content.name: Squid Game
content.description: Like Gi-Hun from squid games said 'you don't trust people here because you can, you do it because you don't have anybody else' Compete as a solo player in the squid game of cse dept, take part in anonymous games and see if you can take home the prize
rules: Each Contestant compete with their co â€“ contestants in simple games that are anonymous.
Step by step elimination is done after each game.
Winner is determined at the end of the Third game.
